DataListSpec.Name: MIMED Documentation Data List
DataListSpec.Description: A data list showing MIMED documentation records.
DataListSpec.Author: UM Dev

SPDataList.c:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_UM_USP_DATALIST_UMHSDOCUMENTATION ( @UMHSID uniqueidentifier, @MSG NVARCHAR(100) = NULL OUTPUT, @CURRENTAPPUSERID uniqueidentifier ) as set nocount on; select un.ID, 'Note' as [DOCUMENTATIONTYPE], un.DATEENTERED, unc.DESCRIPTION as [TYPE], un.TITLE as [TITLE], --un.AUTHORID, c.name as [AUTHOR] from dbo.USR_UMHS_NOTE un inner join dbo.USR_UMHS_NOTETYPECODE unc on unc.ID = un.UMHSNOTETYPECODEID left join dbo.constituent c on c.ID = un.Authorid Where un.UMHSID = @UMHSID order by un.DATEENTERED desc /* --Audit code start */ DECLARE @USERNAME VARCHAR(100) DECLARE @DISPLAYNAME VARCHAR(100) DECLARE @NAME VARCHAR(200) DECLARE @EVENTMESSAGE VARCHAR(1000) DECLARE @PID VARCHAR(100) DECLARE @PATIENTONLY BIT DECLARE @PATIENTSECURITY VARCHAR(100)
SELECT @USERNAME = USERNAME ,@DISPLAYNAME = DISPLAYNAME FROM APPUSER WHERE ID = @CURRENTAPPUSERID SELECT @NAME = NAME ,@PID = LOOKUPID FROM CONSTITUENT inner join USR_UMHS_DATA gp on gp.CONSTITUENTID = CONSTITUENT.ID WHERE gp.ID = @UMHSID
DECLARE @CHANGEAGENTID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER
IF @CHANGEAGENTID is null EXEC dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output;
Declare @PAGEID uniqueidentifier ='88159265-2b7e-4c7b-82a2-119d01ecd40f' --Constituent Page Declare @TABID uniqueidentifier ='d797ffd4-d395-4574-8028-448cced5c31b' --MIMED Data Declare @SUBTABID uniqueidentifier ='2605d220-0622-4020-9fad-98aa7ba742bd' --MIMED Documentation subtab
--Insert in to log table for auditing purpose. INSERT INTO dbo.USR_UMHS_MIMEDTABVIEWLOG(APPUSERID,PAGEID, TABID, SUBTABID, CONTEXTRECORDID, ISPATIENTVIEW, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID,DATEADDED, DATECHANGED ) VALUES ( @CURRENTAPPUSERID,@PAGEID,@TABID,@SUBTABID, @UMHSID, 1, @CHANGEAGENTID , @CHANGEAGENTID, GETDATE(), GETDATE() )
--ADD TO EVENT VIEWER --commenting for now. -- SET @EVENTMESSAGE = 'Username: ' + @USERNAME + ' Displayname: ' + @DISPLAYNAME + ' viewed ' + @NAME + ' PID - ' + @PID + ' GP tab. This record is a ' + @PATIENTSECURITY -- EXEC master.dbo.xp_logevent 60000, @EVENTMESSAGE, informational
-- declare @Msg as varchar(100) set @Msg = 'Your View of MIMED Info Data has been logged! ' /* --Audit code end */
